metadata.summary: Deploy LimaCharlie sensors across Windows and macOS endpoints using Microsoft Intune for centralized enterprise management
metadata.primary_use_case: Deploy LimaCharlie agents at scale using Microsoft Intune in enterprise environments

cross_refs.description: Provides foundational understanding of agent installation and installation keys required before Intune deployment
Explains Windows MSI installation mechanics needed to understand Intune package requirements
Shows how to create custom MSI with embedded installation key required for Intune deployment
Provides alternative mass deployment methods besides Intune
